Quickstrike:




Quickstrike ducked as a loud and furious shot hit the tree he was behind. It 
was a good thing he was short. He waited a few seconds, then bolted to 
another tree, getting closer to Stingtra. All he needed to do was get her 
out of here, then they could all go back to base.
